https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/vfCJ2TFWDXFc1QKDoe0zvTbdHT.jpg "New Maps of Hell" has been hailed as the band's best album in years. This full 23-song live DVD from House of Blues Las Vegas showcases some of their best material from the last thirty years. Bad Religion: New Maps of Hell
